Html:
Hi,

I dissect the code of LinqToAD and try to understand how it works (I read the explanations on your blog too).
But some piece of codes stay obscure for me: I wonder when DirectoryQuery.FindProperties method is called.
Whatever can the projection expression be, never the body of lambda expression is a MemberInitExpression type (and never FindProperties is called).
Could you lighten this point ?
I reply to myself : I think NewExpression type is needed instead of MemberInitExpression. Then the arguments list is iterated and FindProperties() method is called on each argument.

Hi Zim

Thanks for your feedback. Some things were reshuffled around the Orcas Beta 2 timeframe while the origins of the code go back post Orcas Beta 2, hence some archaeology might be left in the code. I'll take a look at this in the next iteration of the project.

Thanks,
-Bart
